definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Vectorization of these generators using parallel instructions is briefly addressed.
sentences.chinese: 這些亂數產生器的製作也可採用平行指令來作向量化。

sentences.english: Creates an instance of an implementation of a cryptographic random number generator.
sentences.chinese: 建立密碼編譯亂數產生器之實作的執行個體。
